name: TOKYO WARFARE
summary:
Arcade battling in real life locations of Japan commanding a multitone rolling beast. Choose between Japan Defence Forces and the invading Red Star forces and engage in battle in fully destroyable anime flavored environments. 
 
Destroy buildings, street furniture and structures while you find  your next prey,  dissable enemy tank components like cannon, turrets, and traction systems and leave them in the middle of the battlefield ready to get their blow of mercy.
